PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades
PageWidgetPortable.Subtitle: Executivo / Arquiteto
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.EXECUTIVO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>true</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO OR A.HANDLE IN (SELECT BA.OPORTUNIDADE FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADESPROD BA WHERE BA.ARQUITETOSOLUCAO = @USUARIO AND BA.STATUS = 1) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES/Resumo.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades
PageWidgetPortable.Subtitle: Gerente de Relacionamento
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GER_REL.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL P JOIN STRING_SPLIT ((SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(K_VERTICALPRODUTO,0, LEN(K_VERTICALPRODUTO)-1), '|', ''),'_',',') FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @usuario), ',') ON VALUE = P.HANDLE)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES/Resumo.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades
PageWidgetPortable.Subtitle: Gerente de Produtos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GER_PROD.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT DISTINCT(HANDLE) FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL V JOIN STRING_SPLIT ((SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(K_VERTICALPRODUTO,0, LEN(K_VERTICALPRODUTO)-1), '|', ''),'_',',') FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO), ',') ON VALUE = V.HANDLE)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES/Resumo.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades
PageWidgetPortable.Subtitle: Arquiteto de Soluções
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.ARQUITETO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT DISTINCT(V.HANDLE) FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL V LEFT JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAEQUIPEOPORTUNIDADE E ON E.OPORTUNIDADE = A.HANDLE LEFT JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADESPROD P ON P.OPORTUNIDADE = A.HANDLE JOIN STRING_SPLIT ((SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(K_VERTICALPRODUTO,0, LEN(K_VERTICALPRODUTO)-1), '|', ''),'_',',') FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO), ',') ON VALUE = V.HANDLE AND (E.USUARIO = @USUARIO OR P.ARQUITETOSOLUCAO = @USUARIO))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/Pages/K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES/Resumo.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
